item.title: Köln
item.description: Köln zeigt sich wenn es um den CO2 Ausstoß geht von seiner besten Seite… Zeichne in den Chart unten, wie sich der Trend laut Pariser Ziele entwickeln sollte: #you-draw-it-paris svg{ overflow: visible; } #you-draw-it-paris .axis{ opacity: .5; } #you-draw-it-paris .line{ fill: none; stroke: black; stroke-width: 3; } #you-draw-it-paris .area{ fill: #eee; } #you-draw-it-paris .your-line{ stroke: #f0f; stroke-width: 3; stroke-dasharray: 5 5; } var data = [{"value":12.13,"year":1990},{"value":10.25,"year":2008},{"value":10,"year":2015},{"value":10,"year":2020},{"value":8.9,"year":2021},{"value":7.8,"year":2022},{"value":6.7,"year":2023},{"value":5.6,"year":2024},{"value":4.5,"year":2025},{"value":3.4,"year":2026},{"value":2.3,"year":2027},{"value":1.3,"year":2028},{"value":0,"year":2029}] var ƒ = d3.

item.title: Münster
item.description: Einleitender Text. Zeichne doch selber: #you-draw-it svg{ overflow: visible; } #you-draw-it .axis{ opacity: .5; } #you-draw-it .line{ fill: none; stroke: black; stroke-width: 3; } #you-draw-it .area{ fill: #eee; } #you-draw-it .your-line{ stroke: #f0f; stroke-width: 3; stroke-dasharray: 5 5; } var data = [{"value":2517,"year":1990},{"value":2471,"year":1995},{"value":2386,"year":2000},{"value":2295,"year":2005},{"value":2116,"year":2006},{"value":2061,"year":2010},{"value":2017,"year":2015},{"value":1981,"year":2016},{"value":1954,"year":2017},{"value":1954,"year":2019},{"value":1913,"year":2020},{"value":1822,"year":2021},{"value":1689,"year":2022},{"value":1557,"year":2023},{"value":1425,"year":2024},{"value":1292,"year":2025},{"value":1160,"year":2026},{"value":1028,"year":2027},{"value":896,"year":2028},{"value":763,"year":2029},{"value":631,"year":2030},{"value":499,"year":2031},{"value":366,"year":2032},{"value":234,"year":2033},{"value":102,"year":2034},{"value":0,"year":2035},{"value":0,"year":2036},{"value":0,"year":2037},{"value":0,"year":2038},{"value":0,"year":2039},{"value":0,"year":2040},{"value":0,"year":2041},{"value":0,"year":2042},{"value":0,"year":2043},{"value":0,"year":2044},{"value":0,"year":2045},{"value":0,"year":2046},{"value":0,"year":2047},{"value":0,"year":2048},{"value":0,"year":2049},{"value":0,"year":2050}] var ƒ = d3.f var sel = d3.select('#you-draw-it').html('') var c = d3.conventions({ parentSel: sel, totalWidth: sel.node().offsetWidth, height: 400, margin: {left: 100, right: 50, top: 30, bottom: 30} }) c.

item.title: Wie füge ich meine Kommune hinzu?
item.description: Wie kann ich die Daten meiner Kommune visualisieren? Emissionsdaten Viele Kommunen erstellen Bilanzen, in denen sie ihre CO2-Emissionen der vergangenen Jahre aufführen. Diese Bilanzen kannst Du über das Ratsinformationssystem Deiner Kommune bekommen. Leider Am interessanten und wichtigsten sind natürlich die Gesamtwerte. year,category,type,value,note 1990,Gesamt,real,2517 1995,Gesamt,real,2459 2016,Gesamt,real,1981 2017,Gesamt,real,1954,last_emissions Oft sind diese Gesamtwerte auch in Kategorien unterteilt, zum Beispiel in: Strom, Wärme, Verkehr. Da diese Kategorien sich von Kommune zu Kommune unterscheiden, ist unser Programm flexibel.
